EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}, here is your ENSI Reinforcement Email #5
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Negotiation & Influencing
View this email in your browser
{!Job__c.Account_Name__c} ENSI Reinforcement Email #5
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Check: How are you going with your PERSONAL ACTION PLANS? (Refer to your ENSI workshop text).
Two questions:
How can you better control the negotiation CLIMATE (Time / Place / Mood)? Who has the PROCESS power – Identifying TACTICS?
Keep asking yourself: What Tactic is the OP using to influence me? Simply naming the tactic will significantly reduce its power.
Towards more successfully negotiated OUTCOMES...
Best regards
{!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c} www.negotiate.org
Special note: Hey you – Stay PROCESS Aware!
P +61 2 9299 9688 | E info.ens@negotiate.org Level 5 83 York Street Sydney NSW 2000 Australia
